Package utilities

Class RayHit

java.lang.Object
utilities.RayHit
public class RayHit
extends java.lang.Object
The RayHit class is used to contain information about an intersection between a Ray object and a Shape object.
Author:
Timothy
See Also:
Ray, Shape, Vector3D

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Vector3D hitPoint  
    private Vector3D normal  
    private Ray ray  
    private Shape shape  
    private double t  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    RayHit​(Ray ray, Shape shape, Vector3D normal, double t)
    The RayHit constructor is used to create a RayHit object with the specified parameters.
    RayHit​(Ray ray, Shape shape, Vector3D normal, Vector3D intersection)
    The RayHit constructor with Vector3D intersection instead of a t value is also used to create a RayHit object with the specified parameters.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    • ray

      private Vector3D hitPoint

  • Constructor Details

    • RayHit

      public RayHit​(Ray ray, Shape shape, Vector3D normal, double t)
      The RayHit constructor is used to create a RayHit object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      ray - The Ray object which intersected with a geometry.
      shape - The Shape object (geometry) which intersected with a Ray object.
      normal - A Vector3D object that is used to normalize the possible reflection Ray object which is created when the getReflectionRay method is called.
      t - A double value specifying the 'distance' from the Ray object to the intersection point on the geometry.
      See Also:
      Ray, Shape, Vector3D

    • RayHit

      public RayHit​(Ray ray, Shape shape, Vector3D normal, Vector3D intersection)
      The RayHit constructor with Vector3D intersection instead of a t value is also used to create a RayHit object with the specified parameters. But here the point of intersection is already calculated.
      Parameters:
      ray - The Ray object which intersected with a geometry.
      shape - The Shape object (geometry) which intersected with a Ray object.
      normal - A Vector3D object that is used to normalize the possible reflection Ray object which is created when the getReflectionRay method is called.
      intersection - A Vector3D object specifying the intersection point of the Ray object and the Shape object.
      See Also:
      Ray, Shape, Vector3D

  • Method Details

    • getT

      public double getT()
      Returns:
      A double value that represents the t value of the RayHit object.

    • getReflectionRay

      public Ray getReflectionRay()
      The getReflectionRay method creates a new Ray objects that represents the reflection ray off of a surface on a Shape object.
      Returns:
      A Ray object that represents the reflection ray off of a Shape object surface.
      See Also:
      Ray, Vector3D

    • getHitPoint

      public Vector3D getHitPoint()
      Returns:
      A Vector3D object that represents the point on which the Ray object and the Shape object intersected.
      See Also:
      Vector3D

    • getShape

      public Shape getShape()
      Returns:
      A Shape object that represents the Shape object that was hit by the Ray object.
      See Also:
      Shape
